name: Excuses
0:
”Alexa, ask maddie's brain to give me an excuse”
”Alexa, ask maddie's brain to tell me an excuse”
”Alexa, tell maddie's brain I need an excuse”
skdetail:

des: Don't wanna go to an event with a friend and need an excuse? Ask Alexa!
